contests.title: Weekly Coding Challenge #1
contests.description: Weekly programming contest featuring algorithmic problems of varying difficulty levels
contests.instructions: Solve as many problems as you can within the time limit. Problems are arranged in increasing order of difficulty.

contests.title: Tech Giants Coding Contest
contests.description: Company-sponsored coding contest simulating technical interview rounds
contests.instructions: This contest simulates real technical interviews. Focus on clean code, optimal solutions, and proper documentation.

contests.title: Python Programming Marathon
contests.description: Extended programming contest focused on Python development and problem-solving
contests.instructions: Use Python to solve complex programming challenges. Libraries like NumPy and Pandas are allowed for data problems.

contests.title: Data Structures Championship
contests.description: Advanced contest focusing on complex data structure problems and algorithmic thinking
contests.instructions: Solve challenging problems involving trees, graphs, heaps, and advanced data structures. Time complexity matters!

contests.title: Web Development Hackathon
contests.description: Build innovative web applications using modern frameworks and technologies
contests.instructions: Create a full-stack web application within the time limit. Focus on functionality, design, and code quality.

contests.title: AI/ML Challenge Cup
contests.description: Machine learning and artificial intelligence problem-solving competition
contests.instructions: Solve real-world AI problems using machine learning algorithms. Data analysis and model building required.
contests.prize: Research Internships and AI Course Vouchers

contests.title: Database Design Competition
contests.description: Design and optimize database systems for complex business scenarios
contests.instructions: Create efficient database schemas, write optimized queries, and solve performance challenges.

contests.title: Java Enterprise Challenge
contests.description: Enterprise-level Java development contest with Spring Boot and microservices
contests.instructions: Build scalable Java applications using enterprise patterns and frameworks. Focus on clean architecture.
